name: Samaritan House Thrift Stores
description: Accepts donations of clothing, housewares, furniture, electronics, and sporting goods; proceeds support free food, health, and housing programs for low-income residents
fullDescription: Samaritan House operates thrift stores throughout San Mateo County, with proceeds supporting their free food, health, and housing programs for low-income residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept housewares and furniture
- Accept electronics
- Accept sporting goods
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds support community programs
howToGetIt:
1. Find nearest Samaritan House location
2. Donate gently used items
3. Or shop at thrift stores
4. Support food and housing programs
5. Check hours before visiting
6. Get donation receipt
keywords: Samaritan House, thrift store, San Mateo, donate clothes, donate furniture, donate electronics, sporting goods, charity shop, food program, housing program
